workInProgress: This feature is still in development, use at your own risk!

deleteModal.title: Delete NFC Card
deleteModal.description: You are about to delete the NFC Card with the ID {{id}}. This action cannot be undone.

enrollModal.title: Enroll NFC Card
enrollModal.description: To enroll a new NFC Card, choose a connected Attractap in the list below. Then click on the button "Enroll new NFC Card" and follow the instructions on the Attractap.
